FILE: cm345630v11.0.txt
DYAD: YUGOSLAVIA - IRAN
RIVALRY: RIV918
DISPUTE(S): MID2820 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180910
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180910

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2820 

TERRMID: MID2820 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2820 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2820 1 -- third party link to territorial MID
TERRLINK-CER: MID2820 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: MID2820 from Gibler 2018, Iran attacked a Yugoslavian ship it suspected was carrying Iraqi goods. Iran regularly attacked countries' export/import cargo ships during its war with Iraq to harm Iraq's economy. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Iran-Iraq War, a territorial war. 

MARITMID: MID2820 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2820 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID2820 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2820 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2820 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2820 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2820 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2820 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2820 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2820 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2820 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2820 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
